# IconButton is just button with icon

    <IconButton name="cloud"/>

## Can use other button props

    <IconButton basic name="cloud" color="pink" size="big"/>

## With caption

    <div>
    <IconButton basic name="cloud" color="pink" size="big">
        Test
    </IconButton>
    <IconButton basic name="cloud" color="pink" size="big">
        <Content>Test</Content>
    </IconButton>
    </div>
